          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Kádár-rendszer gazdasága</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Everyday Life Of The Kádár Regime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Tägliche Lebensdauer Des Kádár Regimes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Vie Quotidienne du Régime de Kádár</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Vida Diária Do Regime De Kádár</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Vita di tutti i giorni Del Regime Di Kádár</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η καθημερινή ζωή του καθεστώτος Kαdαr</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Vida Diaria Del Régimen De Kádár</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A korszakolás, a reform és az azt követő időszak bemutatása.</string>
            <string language="en-US">The periodization, the presentation of the reform and the period following it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">20. század</string>
            <string language="en-US">20th century</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">gazdasági rendszer</string>
            <string language="en-US">economical system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">új gazdasági mechanizmus</string>
            <string language="en-US">new economic mechanism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Nyers Rezső</string>
            <string language="en-US">Rezső Nyers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das periodization, die Darstellung der 
Verbesserung und die Periode, die ihr folgt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le periodization, la présentation de la réforme
et la période la suivant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O periodization, a apresentação da reforma e o 
período que segue a.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il periodization, la presentazione della riforma 
ed il periodo che la segue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το periodization, η παρουσίαση της μεταρρύθμισης και 
η περίοδος που ακολουθεί την.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El periodization, la presentación de la reforma 
y el período que la sigue.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">ökonomisches System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rezs? Nyers</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
